title: Ontology-based communication service for multi-stage production processes
abstract: In production processes, huge amounts of heterogeneous data have to be modelled and made interpretable in order to create value of this data. The problem is particularly relevant for multi-stage and possibly distributed production processes in which an overview of the individual process steps must be created. Modelling of data with semantic technologies provides a solution basis for this, but has not yet been established in industry due to a lack of knowledge about the technologies and advantages of semantic modelling. This paper describes a possible concept for information modelling of production process data with ontologies of different granularity levels. Subsequently, a concept for communication between developed ontologies is presented, with which data of different levels of manufacturing can be networked.
venue: 2022 IEEE International Conference on Technology Management, Operations and Decisions (ICTMOD)
